      • index

        @GetMapping("/albums")
public java.lang.String index​(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Returns an HTTP response containing an array of Albums.
        Parameters:
        model - The model.
        Returns:
        The HTTP response, including the model container of albums, with key "albums".

      • create

        @PostMapping("/albums")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.view.RedirectView create​(@RequestParam
                                                                java.lang.String title,
                                                                @RequestParam
                                                                java.lang.String artist,
                                                                @RequestParam
                                                                int songCount,
                                                                @RequestParam
                                                                java.lang.String albumArtURL,
                                                                @RequestParam
                                                                int length)
        Adds a new album to the repository.
        Parameters:
        title - Album title.
        artist - Album artist.
        albumArtURL - Album art URL.
        length - The length of the album, in seconds.
        Returns:
        A redirect to the album index page (/albums).
